author: remm
msg: - With Jasper's ServletWriter, println(String) != print(String) followed by println(),
because it adds the indentation. I think println(String) shouldn't do the identation,
but we'll keep that fix for later :)

author: remm
msg: - Raise the maximum size of the buffers, which was a bit too restrictive.

author: remm
msg: - If there are no cookies, getCookies will return null.

author: remm
msg: - Generate code with JspException instead of JasperException, which fixes
an instantiation problem when running with a security manager.

author: remm
msg: - Add new runtime JspException, which extends JasperException, to allow
- (Justy, if it's not ok to do that, let me know)
